result.reason: Current implementation lacks a mechanism to visually signal (e.g., flash tab) when activity occurs in a background SSH session; only title synchronization is present.
result.approach: Hook into PuTTY window messages or monitor title changes to trigger a visual alert (color change/flash) on the parent tab.
